ParameterConstraints.description: Specifies whether the parameter is required.

properties.name: Required
properties.description: Specifies whether the parameter is required.

type.description: Specifies whether the parameter is required.

resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGatewayV2::RouteResponse`` resource creates a route response for a WebSocket API. For more information, see [Set up Route Responses for a WebSocket API in API Gateway](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/apigateway-websocket-api-route-response.html) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.

properties.name: ModelSelectionExpression
properties.description: The model selection expression for the route response. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

type.description: The model selection expression for the route response. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

properties.name: ResponseModels
properties.description: The response models for the route response.

type.description: The response models for the route response.

attributes.description: The ``AWS::ApiGatewayV2::RouteResponse`` resource creates a route response for a WebSocket API. For more information, see [Set up Route Responses for a WebSocket API in API Gateway](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/apigateway-websocket-api-route-response.html) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.
